Why have not the teachers in our schools done more of this work? If our people would only realize it, there is no more acceptable work to be done in the home field than to engage in the sale of "Object Lessons"; for while they are thus helping 
                                                                           524
to carry out the Lord's plan for the relief of our schools, they are also bringing the precious truths of the word of God to the attention of the people.
